div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto

div.p: Click here for a messages from Superintendent John Krimmel

div.div: Welcome to our Airport Community Schools' website. Thank you for your interest in our school district. We are proud to say that Airport Schools was voted as the Best Public School in Monroe County by the Monroe Evening News poll in 2017. This was a great honor and validates our mission of serving the children and families of our great community. We take great pride in offering as many programs, high quality education, and extra-curricular activities that make our students' experience at Airport the best that it can be. Safety, learning, and progress are words that are used often at Airport and each and every child is important to the people that work here. We work hard to make sure Jet Pride is evident in everything we do. If you ever have a question or concern, please do not hesitate to contact me. Go Jets! - John Krimmel, Superintendent

h3.a: Monroe Family YMCA Meal Supper Distribution

div.div: ALL families are welcome to receive FREE MEALS for youth up to age 18-NO QUESTIONS ASKED! Click here for full details.

article.aria-label: Enrollment starts soon for Head Start and Great Start Readiness Preschool

h3.a: Enrollment starts soon for Head Start and Great Start Readiness Preschool

div.div: Children who turn 3 by 9/1/2020 are eligible to enroll in Head Start. Children who turn 4 by 9/1/2020 are eligible to enroll in Great Start Readiness Preschool. For full details click on this link.

div.div: In the name of safety we are making some changes to the traffic patterns in the morning before school. Click here to read more and see map.

div.span:
This website is currently being redesigned to comply with both Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act.
If you see anything on this site that does not comply with either Act please notify us immediately so we can correct the problem. Email jtanner@airport.school or call 734.654.4037.
